Articles.Content: how do i make my fuel tanks so that 3 fuel tanks on 3 decouplers don\'t fuel the inner engine?
I don\'t understand the question -- could you draw a picture of the rocket and what sort of fuel flow you want?
Fuel won\'t flow through decouplers, so just don\'t add fuel lines. If I understand the question correctly .

He\'s referring to the semi-bug whereby the outer stacks draw fuel from the inner when the tanks are radially mounted, despite there being no intended connection. I find the best method of preventing it is to simply use decouplers to separate the stacks. Not sure if C7\'s Structural Pylons will do the trick; something tells me they have crossfeed enabled anyway.
